snippet: Marissa Mayer has made sharp acquisitions and rebuilt crucial products, but her future may depend on reaction to her plans for the Alibaba investment.
abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column defends performance of Yahoo chief executive Marissa Mayer two and a half years into her tenure, in light of criticism she has received from many, including activist investors; maintains that by all accounts, including Nicholas Carlson book Marissa Mayer and the Fight to Save Yahoo!, which has documented many of her missteps, Mayer is getting results and performing well.
lead_paragraph: Marissa Mayer has made sharp acquisitions and rebuilt crucial products, but her future may depend on reaction to her plans for the Alibaba investment.

headline.print_headline: Turnaround on Track, Yahoo Chief Still Battles
headline.main: Marissa Mayer’s Plan for Yahoo Takes Hold. The Question Now Is Time.

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Marissa Mayer and the Fight to Save Yahoo (Book)
